message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $180. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. I'm willing to pay a fair price for the product, but I'm on a tight budget.
I understand you have a budget, Bob, but $100 is quite low for the value this product offers. How about we meet in the middle at $140?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but $140 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $110, but that's as high as I can go.
